name: Fame Run
description:
This game has been made as an entry for the Bear Jams Spring 2021 https://itch.io/jam/bear-jams-spring-2021

DESCRIPTION

Fame Run is a fast-paced platformer game where the goal it to complete all the objectives before time runs out and not get hit by a car or have your soul sucked away by those pesky cameras!

IDEA

The idea came to us once we've read this: https://www.quora.com/Do-some-cultures-believe-that-photography-can-steal-your-s.... We thought that it will make an interesting approach to the jams' theme if we make our protagonist a celebrity, who might get his soul taken away by the fans trying to get a picture of him.

AUTHORS

  • Hubert "Epik" Mielnik
  • Dominik "Nyatan" Bartkowski

EXTRA CREDITS

Music featured in game is part of a free Asset: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/electronic/free-music-bundle-b...

Sounds:

https://www.soundjay.com/camera-sound-effect.html

https://www.myinstants.com/instant/triggered-2-58043/
Special thanks to:

  • Brackeys - great tutorials
  • Dani - inspiration and tutorial to create the movement system and play around with ragdoll physics
